content.html: We need to stop thinking about open source sustainability as “raise enough money to work full-time.” Not every maintainer wants that. Sustainability might be better achieved by four people working ten hours a week instead of one person working 40 hours a week.
content.value:
We need to stop thinking about open source sustainability as “raise enough money to work full-time.” Not every maintainer wants that.

Sustainability might be better achieved by four people working ten hours a week instead of one person working 40 hours a week.
